程序包 hust.cs.javacourse.search.parse

类 AbstractTermTupleStream

java.lang.Object
hust.cs.javacourse.search.parse.AbstractTermTupleStream
直接已知子类:
AbstractTermTupleFilter, AbstractTermTupleScanner
public abstract class AbstractTermTupleStream
extends java.lang.Object
 AbstractTermTupleStream是各种TermFreqPosTupleStream对象的抽象父类
      TermFreqPosTupleStream是三元组TermTuple流对象，包含了解析文本文件得到的三元组序列
